item.title: Asciinemaplayer
item.description: asciinema home page Record a cast install a asciinema in you computer, and record a cast 1 ascinema rec hello.cast copy hello.cast to path-to-your-hugo/static/ascrec/ Use shortcode in your Markdown file 1 [[% asciinema cf="hello.cast" speed="2" theme="solarized-light" rows="20" %]] (To avoid Render, I use ‘[’ to replace ‘{', you must replce again! ) result:
